doc.field: Records of the Research Institute for the Study of Man's (RISM) Medical and Social Anthropological Research in Bolivia
Records of the Research Institute for the Study of Man's (RISM) Medical and Social Anthropological Research in Bolivia
Subseries A. Attitudinal Questionnaire / Cedula de Creencias
Subseries A. Attitudinal Questionnaire / Cedula de Creencias

This subseries. contains 229 Attitudinal Questionnaires/Cedulas de Creencias. These questionnaires are organized by community and include the names of persons who were interviewed, mainly teenagers to middle aged men. These names may also appear in the Biographical Index in Subseries III. A. The questionnaires include questions on family, life, work, aspirations, and broad social and cultural attitudes. Specific topics include looking for work, repairing water sources, and raising children. Hypothetical situations are offered on each topic, followed by a series of questions based on these topics.
Records of the Research Institute for the Study of Man's (RISM) Medical and Social Anthropological Research in Bolivia
